Computer.name: Mirai Technologies IT Server
Computer.file:
IT Journal Entry 1: People in a tech company are surprisingly stupid.
IT Journal Entry 2: Some bloke asked me to fix the copier. It was unplugged.
IT Journal Entry 3: Literally the only advice I've given to people whose laptops are "broken" is to turn it off and on again. It's like the duct tape of computers.
IT Journal Entry 4: Fuck my life.
